duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform field work to assist with the management of invasive plant populations on conservation lands, habitat restoration sites, lakes, rivers, and flood control projects.
Assist with data management and monitoring programs including GPS, ArcExplorer, ArcMap, Survey 123 mobile application, and other data management programs.
Function in an office environment and operate equipment such as a personnel computer with standard software programs (Outlook, Word, Excel), copier, etc.

education_certification.credential: High School, college, university, or vocational program enrollment
Minimum GPA of 2.5 for undergraduates or 3.0 for graduates
